Uses of PianoWindow in pitchLab.modes.activePitch
 

Constructors in pitchLab.modes.activePitch with parameters of type PianoWindow
ActivePitchControl(PianoWindow pw, boolean practice)
          Sets the configuration for PitchLab such that Active Pitch mode is enabled and its methods are utilized.
ActivePitchMethods(PianoWindow pw)
          Sets the classes piano window attribute for Active Pitch mode, which in this case is only a line that represents the current note without a piano GUI.
 

Uses of PianoWindow in pitchLab.modes.activeRelative
 

Methods in pitchLab.modes.activeRelative with parameters of type PianoWindow
static void ActiveRelativeMethods.ar_recordIntervalToSet(PianoWindow pw)
          Saves the first and second frequency that will be played in the Active Relative test.
static void ActiveRelativeMethods.ar_rescaleAndPlay(PianoWindow pw)
          Sets the piano window text to the currently selected note that will be set if the user hits enter.
static void ActiveRelativeMethods.ar_rescalePlayTime(PianoWindow pw)
           
static void ActiveRelativeMethods.blendNotes_ar(PianoWindow pw, int xPos)
          Calls appropriate function to blend notes in the Active Relative test
static void ActiveRelativeMethods.blendNotes_arp(PianoWindow pw, int xPos, boolean firstTone)
          Blends the notes together such that a smooth transition of notes is played as the user drags the bar accross the GUI piano window.
